main_definition: The point or place where something begins, arises, or is derived from.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The source or starting point of an object, idea, or process.
meanings_and_examples.example: The origin of the English language can be traced back to several Germanic tribes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The place where a person was born and raised.
meanings_and_examples.example: She often talks about her hometown as the source of her passion for cooking.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The point in time when something begins or is created.
meanings_and_examples.example: The origin of democracy can be traced back to ancient Greece around 508 BCE.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A geographical area from which a species originally evolved and spread.
meanings_and_examples.example: The African elephant is native to sub-Saharan Africa, where it has been living for millions of years.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of design or architecture, the original location or place from which a work was derived or created.
meanings_and_examples.example: The architect studied the origin of this historic building to ensure accurate restoration.
